amendment.description: To clarify the jurisdiction of the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

action.text: Amendment SA 3994 as previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3994 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3994 proposed by Senator Chambliss to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10625, S10629-10630, S10631; text: CR S10625) To clarify the jurisdiction of the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3994 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3994 proposed by Senator Chambliss to Amendment SA 3981.
